thread.title: Imran Khan view on PSL in Foreign Country
thread.title_full: Imran Khan view on PSL in Foreign Country

author: Ghafoor
title: Imran Khan view on PSL in Foreign Country
text:
Cricket Â· Tagged: Cricket , Imran Khan , Najam Sethi , Pakistan , Pakistan cricket team , Pakistan Super League 

Karachi, Ex captain of Pakistan cricket team, Imran Khan says that Pakistan cricket board is conducting Pakistan Super League in foreign country and it is useless practice for the country. He stressed to conduct his event in the country. He said that you could gather money to conduct this mega event in the foreign country but this event would not give advantage to your cricket. 
He also criticized the cricketing system in the country and said that board failed to search or hunt the new talent in the country. He blamed that Najam Sethi is the part of the board but he did not know the skills and technique of cricket. He further added that the talented players are included in the national team very late, which is not good sign for the cricket system. Advertisement
